Package org.apache.calcite.rel.rules.materialize

package org.apache.calcite.rel.rules.materialize
Provides a materialized rewriting algorithm encapsulated within a planner rule.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.calcite.rel.rules
    Provides a core set of planner rules.
